definition[0]: to think about a problem, plan etc for a long time before making a decision
example[0]: He’s mulling over the proposals before making any changes.
example[1]: The company is mulling over a share offer.
definition[1]: an area of land that sticks out into the sea – used in Scotland
definition[2]: a large island off the west coast of Scotland, the largest island in the Inner Hebrides. It is often visited by tourists, especially in summer.
